details: Relevant coursework: Pattern Recognition, Modern Signal Processing, Acoustics and Remote Sensing, Electromagnetics, Stochastic Processes.
Recipient of Sears B. Condit Award, given to top 100 students by GPA out of 3,000 person senior class
Recipient of Roland Guyer Porter Award, given annually to undergraduates whom promote education and service throughout university
Former President, Northeastern Chapter of Eta Kappa Nu; leading electrical engineering honor society.
